item.title: What's going on in my shell?
item.description: To help me figure this out, I use a few shell functions. Firstly, I need to know what configuration file that was used. function shell_init_file() { # Returns what would be your initfile if [[ $- == *i* ]]; then echo ~/.bashrc elif [[ -f ~/.bash_profile ]]; then echo ~/.bash_profile elif [[ -f ~/.bash_login ]]; then echo ~/.bash_login elif [[ -f ~/.profile ]]; then echo ~/.profile else echo "Could not find any config files.
